channel.title: Command To Type for Other players!

item.title: Command To Type for Other players!
item.dc:creator: @Pk_all_Noobz Pk all Noobz
item.description:
@Pk_all_Noobz wrote:

I wrote this but it fails…

I’m not great with private servers. So Help me out all I want is it to try for other people making them say things that they really don’t want to say…
This is what I have…

if (command.startsWith("control") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Noob")) { String[] args = command.split(" "); String name = command.substring(6); String s = String.parseInt(args[2]); // What goes here? no clue I dont think I was suppose to program it like this. try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.plrText = s; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; }catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2009, 12:50:13 pm[/size][hr]No Ideas?

Read full topic
